sentences.english: The plastic surgery industry has been amply augmented.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，整形外科手术业得到了长足的发展。

sentences.english: And it was the poems composing in play itself to get considerable development in the Tang Dynasty too.
sentences.chinese: 并且戏作诗本身也是在唐代得到长足的发展的。

sentences.english: Since the 20th century, a great progress has been made in research on infiltration and runoff yield.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪以来，入渗与产流研究取得了长足进展。

sentences.english: Over the past 3 decades, China-EU relations have made substantial progress.
sentences.chinese: 30年来，中欧关系取得了长足发展。

sentences.english: Since China' s reform and opening policy, the non-state running enterprises of Wenzhou have made great progress.
sentences.chinese: 改革开放以来，温州民营经济取得了长足的进展。

sentences.english: After she changed schools, she began to make much better progress.
sentences.chinese: 她转学以后，开始有长足的进步。

sentences.english: Tonight, I cannot help but marvel at how far we have come together.
sentences.chinese: 今晚，我不禁对双方交往的长足进展感到惊叹。

sentences.english: But next year on Broadway I hope to see a large improvement in that.
sentences.chinese: 不过明年到百老汇混的话，我一定要有长足的进步。

sentences.english: To be sure, Europe has come far over the past 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，过去10年欧洲已经有了长足进步。

sentences.english: He also noted that he hopes bilateral friendship will make long-term progress in the future.
sentences.chinese: 他还希望双边友好关系在未来取得长足进展。

sentences.english: Big Blue has come a long way since 1984.
sentences.chinese: “蓝色巨人”自1984年来有了长足的进步。

sentences.english: This paper has analyzed the difficulties, which the development of natural food plant spices industry has faced.
sentences.chinese: 近年来天然食用植物香料工业获得了长足的发展。

sentences.english: Reportage in China has made great progress in the new period. However, masterpieces that can shake the world haven't yet appearers.
sentences.chinese: 新时期我国报告文学有长足发展，但优秀之作不多。

sentences.english: Along with the official education, the private developed as well.
sentences.chinese: 在官学的带动下，私学教育也获得了长足发展。

sentences.english: He has made considerable progress in his studies at the university.
sentences.chinese: 他在大学的学业上有了长足的进展。

sentences.english: This study provides a theoretical basis for developing attractant of C. buqueti.
sentences.chinese: 本研究为研制长足大竹象取食引诱剂提供了理论依据。

definition: to advance by leaps and bounds
lit. one day, a thousand miles (idiom); rapid progress
to take it up a notch/to bring it up a level
lit. like a tiger that has grown wings/with redoubled power (idiom)
